data.label: 手游安全 SDK
data.description: 手游安全是由腾讯游戏安全提供的专业手游安全解决方案。帮助手游厂商快速应对修改器、变速器等常见游戏安全问题。手游安全为王者荣耀、火影忍者等数百款游戏，超过 7 亿玩家提供稳定安全服务。具备 24 小时安全保障能力，支持全方位多维度的防护与检测，仅需客户端 2 - 3 个接口调用即可完成接入，无后台开发成本。

data.label: Mobile Game Security SDK
data.description: Mobile game security is a professional mobile game security solution provided by Tencent Game Security. It helps mobile game manufacturers quickly respond to common game security issues such as modifiers and accelerators. Mobile game security provides stable and secure services for hundreds of games, including Honor of Kings and Naruto, with over 700 million players. It has 24-hour security protection capabilities, supporting comprehensive and multi-dimensional protection and detection, requiring only 2-3 client interface calls to complete integration, with no backend development costs.
